markdownRemark.html:
To finalize the topic about social activity visualizations, I created a web app (in Russian) that does that interactively.

The visualizations are based on data from d3.ru, an online platform based on a rating system that allows users to appraise other individual users as well as content entries and comments posted by them.

A user can enter any username (or usernames) and see the stats.
